de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.util

Class MetaArffHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.util.MetaArffHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArffGen

    public class MetaArffHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArffGen
    Created by timo on 12/16/14. Creates Arff Files for a meta classifier classifying Texts by using votes of several other classifiers.
